title: What big name stores will be added (and when)to the Home Depot shopping area in Monkey Junction? Please say a Target!
text:
Sorry, but we checked with Target a few months ago and there are no
plans for a new Wilmington location. Of course, that can all change --
site plans can be subject to retooling at any time.

Our retails reporter Judy Royal is working on a column about all the
new stores coming to the area, and will include the Monkey Junction
area in her report. Because of how much work will be involved, she is
working toward the third Friday in September. Her column is called
Retail Details. Thanks!
